00011 /**
00012  * @brief Changes specified parameters.
00013  *
00014  * @param[in] feedback_gain_ feedback gain
00015  * @param[in] feedback_threshold_ feedback threshold
00016  * @param[in] mpc_alpha_ alpha gain for the QP objective
00017  * @param[in] mpc_beta_ beta gain for the QP objective
00018  * @param[in] mpc_gamma_ gamma gain for the QP objective
00019  * @param[in] step_height_ height of a step
00020  */
00021 void oru_walk::setWalkParameters (
00022         const float &feedback_gain_,
00023         const float &feedback_threshold_,
00024         const float &mpc_alpha_,
00025         const float &mpc_beta_,
00026         const float &mpc_gamma_,
00027         const float &step_height_)
00028 {
00029     wp.set (
00030         feedback_gain_,
00031         feedback_threshold_,
00032         mpc_alpha_,
00033         mpc_beta_,
00034         mpc_gamma_,
00035         step_height_);
00036 }

00040 
00041 void oru_walk::walk()
00042 {
00043     if (solver != NULL)
00044     {
00045         delete solver;
00046         solver = NULL;
00047     }
00048 
00049     if (wmg != NULL)
00050     {
00051         delete wmg;
00052         wmg = NULL;
00053     }
00054 
00055     if (com_filter != NULL)
00056     {
00057         delete com_filter;
00058         com_filter = NULL;
00059     }
00060 
00061     next_preview_len_ms = 0;
00062 
00063 
00064 // solver    
00065     solver = new smpc::solver(
00066             wp.preview_window_size, // size of the preview window
00067             wp.mpc_alpha,
00068             wp.mpc_beta,
00069             wp.mpc_gamma,
00070             wp.mpc_regularization,
00071             wp.mpc_tolerance);
00072 
00073     com_filter = new avgFilter(wp.filter_window_length);
00074 
00075 // models
00076     initWMG_NaoModel();
00077 
00078     ORUW_LOG_OPEN(nao.state_sensor, wp.filter_window_length);
00079 
00080 // Connect callback to the DCM post proccess
00081     try
00082     {
00083         fDCMPostProcessConnection =
00084             getParentBroker()->getProxy("DCM")->getModule()->atPostProcess
00085             (boost::bind(&oru_walk::callbackEveryCycle_walk, this));
00086     }
00087     catch (const AL::ALError &e)
00088     {
00089         ORUW_HALT("Error when connecting to DCM postProccess: " + e.toString());
00090     }
00091 }

00094 void oru_walk::halt(const string &message, const char* function)
00095 {
00096     stopWalking(message);
00097     throw ALERROR(getName(), function, message);
00098 }

00101 void oru_walk::stopWalking(const string& message)
00102 {
00103     qiLogInfo ("module.oru_walk", message.c_str());
00104     fDCMPostProcessConnection.disconnect();
00105     ORUW_LOG_CLOSE;
00106 }

00110 /**
00111  * @brief 
00112  * @attention REAL-TIME!
00113  */
00114 void oru_walk::callbackEveryCycle_walk()
00115 {
00116     readSensors (nao.state_sensor);
00117 
00118     ORUW_TIMER(wp.loop_time_limit_ms);
00119     ORUW_LOG_JOINTS(nao.state_sensor, nao.state_model);
00120     ORUW_LOG_COM(wmg, nao.state_sensor);
00121     ORUW_LOG_FEET(nao);
00122     ORUW_LOG_JOINT_VELOCITIES(nao.state_sensor, (double) wp.control_sampling_time_ms/1000);
00123 
00124     feedbackError ();
00125 
00126     if (! solveMPCProblem ())
00127     {
00128         return;
00129     }
00130 
00131 
00132     // support foot and swing foot position/orientation
00133     double left_foot_pos[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE + 1];
00134     double right_foot_pos[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE + 1];
00135     wmg->getFeetPositions (
00136             wp.preview_sampling_time_ms/wp.control_sampling_time_ms,
00137             (wp.preview_sampling_time_ms - next_preview_len_ms)/wp.control_sampling_time_ms + 1,
00138             left_foot_pos,
00139             right_foot_pos);
00140     nao.setFeetPostures (left_foot_pos, right_foot_pos);
00141 
00142 
00143     // position of CoM
00144     /// @attention hCoM is constant!
00145     nao.setCoM(wmg->init_state.x(), wmg->init_state.y(), wmg->hCoM);
00146 
00147 
00148     if (nao.igm () < 0)
00149     {
00150         ORUW_HALT("IK does not converge.\n");
00151     }
00152 
00153     int failed_joint = nao.checkJointBounds();
00154     if (failed_joint >= 0)
00155     {
00156         qiLogInfo ("module.oru_walk", "Failed joint: %d\n", failed_joint);
00157         ORUW_HALT("Joint bounds are violated.\n");
00158     }
00159 
00160 
00161     // Set commands
00162     try
00163     {
00164         walkCommands[4][0] = dcmProxy->getTime(wp.control_sampling_time_ms);
00165         for (int i = 0; i < LOWER_JOINTS_NUM; i++)
00166         {
00167             walkCommands[5][i][0] = nao.state_model.q[i];
00168         }
00169         dcmProxy->setAlias(walkCommands);
00170     }
00171     catch (const AL::ALError &e)
00172     {
00173         ORUW_HALT("Cannot set joint angles: " + e.toString());
00174     }
00175 
00176     next_preview_len_ms -= wp.control_sampling_time_ms;
00177     ORUW_TIMER_CHECK;
00178 }

00182 /**
00183  * @brief Correct state and the model based on the sensor data.
00184  */
00185 void oru_walk::feedbackError ()
00186 {
00187     double CoM_pos[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE];
00188     nao.state_sensor.getCoM (CoM_pos);
00189 
00190     //com_filter->addValue(CoM_pos[0], CoM_pos[1], state_sensor.x(), state_sensor.y());
00191 
00192     smpc::state_orig state_error;
00193     state_error.set (
00194             wmg->init_state.x() - CoM_pos[0],
00195             wmg->init_state.y() - CoM_pos[1]);
00196 
00197     if (state_error.x() > wp.feedback_threshold)
00198     {
00199         state_error.x() -= wp.feedback_threshold;
00200     }
00201     else if (state_error.x() < -wp.feedback_threshold)
00202     {
00203         state_error.x() += wp.feedback_threshold;
00204     }
00205     else
00206     {
00207         state_error.x() = 0.0;
00208     }
00209 
00210     if (state_error.y() > wp.feedback_threshold)
00211     {
00212         state_error.y() -= wp.feedback_threshold;
00213     }
00214     else if (state_error.y() < -wp.feedback_threshold)
00215     {
00216         state_error.y() += wp.feedback_threshold;
00217     }
00218     else
00219     {
00220         state_error.y() = 0.0;
00221     }
00222 
00223     wmg->init_state.x() -= wp.feedback_gain * state_error.x();
00224     wmg->init_state.y() -= wp.feedback_gain * state_error.y();
00225 }

00230 /**
00231  * @brief Update joint angles in the NAO model.
00232  */
00233 void oru_walk::readSensors(modelState& nao_state)
00234 {
00235     accessSensorValues->GetValues (sensorValues);
00236     for (int i = 0; i < JOINTS_NUM; i++)
00237     {
00238         nao_state.q[i] = sensorValues[i];
00239     }
00240 }

00244 /**
00245  * @brief 
00246  * @attention Hardcoded parameters.
00247  */
00248 void oru_walk::initWMG_NaoModel()
00249 {
00250     wmg = new WMG();
00251     wmg->init(wp.preview_window_size);     // size of the preview window
00252 
00253     double d[4];
00254 
00255     // each step is defined relatively to the previous step
00256     double step_x = 0.035;      // relative X position
00257     double step_y = 0.1;       // relative Y position
00258 
00259 
00260     d[0] = 0.09;
00261     d[1] = 0.025;
00262     d[2] = 0.03;
00263     d[3] = 0.025;
00264     wmg->AddFootstep(0.0, step_y/2, 0.0, 0, 0, d, FS_TYPE_SS_L);
00265 
00266     // Initial double support
00267     d[0] = 0.09;
00268     d[1] = 0.075;
00269     d[2] = 0.03;
00270     d[3] = 0.025;
00271     wmg->AddFootstep(0.0, -step_y/2, 0.0, 10, 10, d, FS_TYPE_DS);
00272     // ZMP, CoM are at [0;0]
00273 
00274 
00275     // all subsequent steps have normal feet size
00276     d[0] = 0.09;
00277     d[1] = 0.025;
00278     d[2] = 0.03;
00279     d[3] = 0.025;
00280     // 2 reference ZMP positions in single support 
00281     // 1 in double support
00282     // 1 + 2 = 3
00283     wmg->AddFootstep(0.0   , -step_y/2, 0.0 , 20,  25, d);
00284     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00285     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00286     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00287     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00288     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00289     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00290     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00291     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00292     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00293     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00294     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00295     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00296     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00297     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00298     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00299     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00300     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00301     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x, -step_y, 0.0);
00302     wmg->AddFootstep(step_x,  step_y, 0.0);
00303 
00304     // here we give many reference points, since otherwise we 
00305     // would not have enough steps in preview window to reach 
00306     // the last footsteps
00307     d[0] = 0.09;
00308     d[1] = 0.025;
00309     d[2] = 0.03;
00310     d[3] = 0.075;
00311     wmg->AddFootstep(0.0   , -step_y/2, 0.0, 140, 140, d, FS_TYPE_DS);
00312     d[0] = 0.09;
00313     d[1] = 0.025;
00314     d[2] = 0.03;
00315     d[3] = 0.025;
00316     wmg->AddFootstep(0.0   , -step_y/2, 0.0 , 0,  0, d, FS_TYPE_SS_R);
00317 
00318 
00319 // Nao
00320     readSensors(nao.state_sensor);
00321 
00322     // support foot position and orientation
00323     nao.init (
00324             IGM_SUPPORT_LEFT,
00325             0.0, 0.05, 0.0, // position
00326             0.0, 0.0, 0.0);  // orientation
00327     
00328     wmg->init_param (     
00329             (double) wp.preview_sampling_time_ms / 1000, // sampling time in seconds
00330             nao.CoM_position[2],                      // height of the center of mass
00331             wp.step_height);                // step height (for interpolation of feet movements)
00332 
00333     double pos_error[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE];
00334     nao.state_sensor.getSwingFootPosition (pos_error);
00335     pos_error[0] =  0.0  - pos_error[0];
00336     pos_error[1] = -0.05 - pos_error[1];
00337     pos_error[2] =  0.0  - pos_error[2];
00338     wmg->correctNextSSPosition (pos_error);
00339 
00340     wmg->initABMatrices ((double) wp.control_sampling_time_ms / 1000);
00341     wmg->init_state.set (nao.CoM_position[0], nao.CoM_position[1]);
00342 }

00345 
00346 /**
00347  * @brief 
00348  */
00349 bool oru_walk::solveMPCProblem ()
00350 {
00351     ORUW_TIMER(wp.loop_time_limit_ms);
00352 
00353     if (next_preview_len_ms == 0)
00354     {
00355         if (wmg->isSupportSwitchNeeded())
00356         {
00357             double pos_error[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE];
00358             nao.switchSupportFoot(pos_error);
00359             wmg->correctNextSSPosition(pos_error);
00360         }
00361 
00362         WMGret wmg_retval = wmg->formPreviewWindow();
00363 
00364 
00365         if (wmg_retval == WMG_HALT)
00366         {
00367             stopWalking("Not enough steps to form preview window. Stopping.");
00368             return (false);
00369         }
00370 
00371 
00372         next_preview_len_ms = wp.preview_sampling_time_ms;
00373     }
00374 
00375     wmg->T[0] = (double) next_preview_len_ms / 1000; // get seconds
00376     //------------------------------------------------------
00377     solver->set_parameters (wmg->T, wmg->h, wmg->h[0], wmg->angle, wmg->zref_x, wmg->zref_y, wmg->lb, wmg->ub);
00378     solver->form_init_fp (wmg->fp_x, wmg->fp_y, wmg->init_state, wmg->X);
00379     int num_iq_constr = solver->solve();
00380     ORUW_LOG_NUM_CONSTRAINTS(num_iq_constr);
00381     //------------------------------------------------------
00382     // update state
00383     wmg->next_control.get_first_controls (*solver);
00384     wmg->calculateNextState(wmg->next_control, wmg->init_state);
00385     //------------------------------------------------------
00386     
00387     ORUW_TIMER_CHECK;
00388     return (true);
00389 }
